Root document took 250¬†ms

Reduce unused JavaScriptSave 60 ms
Est savings of 243¬†KiB
Reduce unused JavaScript and defer loading scripts until they are required to decrease bytes consumed by network activity. [Learn how to reduce unused JavaScript](https://developer.chrome.com/docs/lig...
Defer offscreen imagesSave 60 ms
Est savings of 124¬†KiB

Est savings of 77¬†KiB

Est savings of 80¬†ms

Est savings of 114¬†KiB

Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovere...
Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes 0
Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.co...
Structured data is valid n/a
Run the [Structured Data Testing Tool](https://search.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/) and the [Structured Data Linter](http://linter.structured-data.org/) to validate structured data. [Learn...
Passed: 6 ¬∑ Not applicable: 1

Links do not have descriptive text 0
4 links found

Links are not crawlable 0
Search engines may use `href` attributes on links to crawl websites. Ensure that the `href` attribute of anchor elements links to an appropriate destination, so more pages of the site can be discovere...
Image elements do not have `[alt]` attributes 0
Informative elements should aim for short, descriptive alternate text. Decorative elements can be ignored with an empty alt attribute. [Learn more about the `alt` attribute](https://dequeuniversity.co...
